casebody.data:
Second Department,

February, 1981

(February 2, 1981) Action Crane Corporation, Plaintiff, v Willets Point Contracting Corp., Defendant. (Action No. 1.) Action Crane Corporation, Respondent, v Willets Point Contracting Corp., Appellant. (Action No. 2.)

Order of the Supreme Court, Nassau County, entered October 11, 1979, as resettled by a further order of the same court entered December 14, 1979, affirmed, with one bill of $50 costs and disbursements. No opinion. Lazer, J. P., Mangano, Cohalan and Margett, JJ., concur.
